caseTitle: Pakistan Telecommunication Employees Trust (PTET) thr. its M.D., Islamabad v. Muhammad Arif & others
tagline: The respondents, who were the employees of the Pakistan Telegraph and Telephone (T&T) Department having retired after their transfer to the Pakistan Telecommunication Corporation and the Pakistan Telecommunication Company Limited, will be entitled to the same pension as is announced by the Government of Pakistan and that the Board of Trustees of the Pakistan Telecommunication Employees Trust is bound to follow such announcement of the Government in respect of such employees.
